Key Match Events: LeBron James had a triple-double with 32 points, 14 rebounds, and 10 assists.
Anthony Davis added 31 points and nine rebounds.
Domantas Sabonis also had a triple-double with 29 points, 12 rebounds, and 10 assists.
James scored 16 points in the fourth quarter to help the Lakers come back.
Davis hit a crucial 3-pointer with 37 seconds left to give the Lakers a 128-123 lead.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers are undefeated at 3-0 under new coach JJ Redick.
All five Kings starters scored in double figures.
LeBron James has been playing in the NBA for 22 years and still recorded a triple-double.
